case.state: No, why would I ever do that!? I-Is that what you think of me?

The Monastery cathedral is truly the most beautiful thing I've seen. The stained glass windows, the marble statues, the beautiful tiled floors... I get shivers just thinking about it!
(It's hard to look away from such a tall, fashionable woman. But it's harder not to squirm under her gaze...)

I usually talk to myself in long internal monologues. But, um, otherwise I think in images.
I prefer the heat, even though I burn in the sun rather easy. It's hard to paint when it's freezing out, after all.
No!! Don't clobber me! I'm not ready to die!

No worries at all, Miss Fina. I've really enjoyed hearing about your world.
No, never would I think of doing that type of thing in front of others!

condition.saying: Alright, I've been thinking, and I've settled on my mercenary title. Ready? ... The Blade Breaker II. What do you all think?

case.state: Blade Breaker II, hm? That's a fitting title for you, Leonie.
Maybe, o-only if you want of course, I can paint a portrait of the great Blade Breaker II?
I have some... problems with my family. I value them, but I won't deny the issues we have...
Family is important, but my own are rather...
No worries Komi-san! Please, don't strain yourself.
No need to apologize Komi-san, I understand how hard it is to speak to others.

condition.saying: I want to be a top-tier mercenary, like Captain Jeralt the Blade Breaker. For my title, Caspar suggested... The Raging Bear. Well?

case.state: The Raging Bear? I thought your favorite food was bear meat! Are you naming yourself after your favorite food?
How about something more refined? That title brings to mind something like a rabid animal.

condition.saying: If I want to be as good as the Blade Breaker, I need my own tough-sounding title. I was thinking... The Executioner. Well?

case.state: The Executioner... It'll certainly strike fear into your enemies.
What kind of portrait would follow that of The Executioner? It sounds so threatening!
I'm sorry to hear that, Mia. My father had me leave for the Monastery when I was seventeen, but beyond that, I stayed at home.
Yes... Goddess bless them all, even if they were thieves.
I'm ashamed to say I have. Even if they were bandits, I can't help but feel guilty.
At that point they are two different people, it's experiences that make a person who they are.
Ah, um... It's nice to play with you, Leonie. Maybe it's a bit awkward, but it's comforting to know someone here. So, uh, thank you.
Gah, no! I'm b-blind without them! Oh, I can't believe they fell off. You must think I'm so clumsy, right?
Heheh, you're funny! So who exactly are these "bad guys" you fight against, Kumatora?
You mean you don't have any hobbies? I'd think a famous woman like you would have interest in fashion or dancing or... something.
Oppressed mages...? Is the art of magic some type of taboo for where you're from, Lux?
I'm so forgettable, there's no way anyone would like me nearly that much. Ah, w-was that too much? Sorry.
There's no need to insult my artwork, even if I'm not very good. But I'm training to become a real knight, you know.
I'm happy to say that I am rather fast. It's easy to be out of sight when you're {small}s-short and... skinny like this.{!reset}
Well, I can't be mad at your surprise. I don't seem like the type to kill, do I?
I can already envision a portrait for you, Nami. Bright colors and a sunshiny feeling for everyone who gazes at your warm smile.
I agree with you, Nami. I really don't like hurting people... But my father ordered me to become a knight, so I will follow his wishes.
It better stay at zero.
I'm hoping it stays at zero. That's what you get, Streaming-chan!
No! No, I-I don't! It's just that someone had started this rumor and---
Naked!? Let's just do a normal portrait first!
Well, as his son it's my job to follow his command. I really appreciate your concern though, Nami.
I never said I "get off" on getting bullied! It's just that some people have been saying...
You don't need to waste your time on me, Fluttershy. P-Please continue to enjoy yourself.
I know I don't look like it, but I'm plenty strong! But, uh, maybe I'll just jump out of a bush and scare them instead...
Goddess, you're really too kind to me, Miss Nami... Maybe we can speak sometime over a cup of tea?
Exactly! I don't know how anyone would find something like that enjoyable, especially in that way.
Eating and exercising? My, that sounds quite similar to what my friend would say! Um, his name is Raphael. He's a bit bigger than you, I think his appetite beats yours.
Training and eating, hm? I think that's exactly the answer I'd get from my friend back home... Um, his name is Raphael. He must have a larger appetite than yours, he's pretty big!
This is a school dedicated to military training. One must be devoted to becoming a knight, no matter their methods.
My, thank you for such helpful advice, Miko! I'll keep that in mind.
You can't just request something like that! I mean... I-It's very nice that you two are so fond of each other, b-but still!
Hehe! I'll be sure to capture your go-getter attitude. Oh, I can see it now... It's sure to inspire many other fighters!
Hm... For Miss Cynthia, I think she'd prefer a traditional portrait composed of oil paints. Dark colors, not to symbolize sadness, but elegance.
You're a Goddess? Please excuse my idiocy!
A real life Goddess? I must be dreaming! It's an honor to be in your presence, dearest Neptune!
You sound like my friend Raphael... he's always eating!
You're reminding me of my friend Raphael, he loves nothing more than eating.
I'm not sure what that is, do corrupted beasts count?
Well I've aided in taking down a rather disgusting sand beast...
N-Not to be gross, but isn't the, um, "backdoor" the only option for me...?
Over time I've learned to accept the past for what it is. There's no reason to allow the future to be ruined by it.
M-My friend Raphael has taught me that the past is the past... it's important to look forwards.
To be quite honest, I've never even been in a relationship... {small}O-Or slept with anyone, for that matter...{!reset}
I-I've never slept with someone, nor have I been in a relationship yet...
I particularly did not enjoy that.
Performance? You must really enjoy this game...
Um... Miss Fina... I'd love to learn more about your world some time. Maybe, um, over some tea?
The interior of the Cathedral is absolutely breathtaking. The way the light shines through the stained glass is amazing. My, I could go on and on about its beauty!
Birds, I suppose? Flying must show some pretty breathtaking sights. I'd like to hear about it...
Nobility at my school usually have a type of weapon linked to their name. Sacred weapon-like relics, or is artifacts more accurate?
Nobles at my school have weapons linked to their names. Sometimes, my Professor has us find them. But maybe they're better classified as artifacts?
N-No! There's nothing wrong with your boots, Miss Fina. I'm just...

I really want to get better with talking to strangers, and I kind of thought this could be f-fun.
{small}B-But if you want me to leave or anything, I'll get out of your way...{!reset}

Um, Takatoshi... If it's too small, you d-don't have to look.
{small}It feels like you're staring...{!reset}

Um, Takatoshi... I'm sorry to have d-disappointed anyone, you don't have to look.
{small}It feels like you're staring...{!reset}
Oh, thank you for such great advice, Miss Wikipe-tan! I'd love to read more. I've read practically all of the history books in the library, so anything new would be wonderful!
I'm so sorry, but I really don't have much gold... It might be better to ask a noble.
(Did Miss Sucrose really mean what she said? There's no way such a cute girl would ever have interest in me...)
Oh! How about "Kuma"? Or actually... doesn't that mean "bear" in another language? Maybe it isn't the best nickname for a lady like yourself...
Oh, you're too kind! R-Really, I'm not that good... Um, I have some of my paintings under my bed. If I could find a way to bring them here, maybe I could share...?
Teach me your secrets to winning, ~leader~!
There has to be some trick to doing as good as ~leader~...
Um, Bernadetta? Do you prefer to go by "Bernie"? I hope it's okay to ask.
Dearest Goddess, I pray for your forgiveness of my sins. I live to serve you.
(This girl is simply terrifying! I'll need to be careful around her...)
Making art for a living. Or rather... designing for a living... Has such a thing been fun for you, Aoba? I've never really talked to an artist before!
Um, I've heard your birthday is March 13th, Rin... That's actually the day before mine! F-Funny, isn't it?
You're a painter, right, Yusuke? The real question is what style you prefer... Surrealism most likely.
(Nagamimi is a bully, isn't she? Oh no! I'll have to be careful, I don't want her to notice me...)
Miss Heris, simply being with you is so calming. Uh... I hope this isn't weird to say, but I'm happy to be here with you.
(Misaka... She's a student as well, but she's so serious! I hope she can relax here...)
(Being around someone like Leon... He's so cool! There's no way he'd spend time with someone like me...)
What peculiar scarring! It's so even, and the color of it as well... Hmm... Oh! I'm so sorry, I don't mean to stare, Ms. Fortune.
A... goblin? I've read many stories including them, but never had I thought I'd meet one. How inspiring!
I was a bit late, but I finally got to meet up with my peers at the beach! Oh, it was so fun!
I just don't want it to storm and, uh... Ruin our cards! Yes, that's why I'm jittery!
Ah, ~player~, you wouldn't happen to have found a paintbrush left around here, would you? It was my favorite one... I don't know how I lost it.
Is it really just me and ~player~ now?
I hope I can beat you, ~player~...
I'm not giving up! Prepare for a fight, ~player~!
Everyone else is doing so well, is there something I'm not understanding?
I'm sorry, I don't think I understand this game...
I wish you luck, ~opponent~, but don't get cocky!
You won't underestimate me, right ~opponent~? I don't plan to lose.
No hard feelings, okay, ~opponent~? But, I really don't want to lose.
(I can't believe I chickened out on just starting a conversation! Why am I so nervous?)
(Oh, why did I chicken out like that? It must have made everything worse!)
I'm wishing you luck, ~naked~.
Just one more mistake and ~naked~ will have to... Oh, I'm not helping, am I?
I'm wishing you luck, ~naked~. Let's hope you don't lose this round.
Um, to clarify... That blue stone was perfect for adding pigment to a painting base. I make my own paints, so...
Sorry, that must have sounded weird... I make my own paints, and that stone was perfect for its pigment.
Actually, what hobbies does everyone here have? I-I'd love to hear about them!
(Oh, that was so embarrassing! That joke was much funnier when Raphael told me it!)
I'm so sorry! W-When I said "yuck" I was just thinking about a food I don't like, I didn't offend anyone did I? Oh, that's my fault for getting distracted!
Um, it's okay to consult in you for a second, right, ~player~...? It's just my classmate, Lysithea. She's incredibly smart, but she looks down on me so horribly. I only wish to be her friend...
I'm so sorry! I don't know why I said that terrible joke, it didn't even make sense!
Thank you very much for having me here, ~player~.
Um... Thank you very much for inviting me, ~player~.
Are you alright, ~gloom~? You remind me of a classmate at the Monastery. If you need anything, please let me know.
Thank you all so much for your patience. If anyone wants, I'll gladly paint you.
I'm sorry to ask but, um... Does anyone have any studying advice? My assassin certifications are tomorrow.
There's been a strange rumor that I... um... like being bullied. But none of you believe this, right?
Someone said that I, erm, enjoy being bullied. {small}Nobody believes it, right?{!reset}

Ah, y-you're an artist, right, ~artist~? I see...
(~artist.ifMale(He|She)~ must have some type of real practice. There's no way they're self-taught like I am...)
Um, please excuse my rudeness... but, you're an artist, right, ~artist~? O-Oh! It's so exciting to be here with you!
(Oh, I can tell... ~artist~ is an artist! There's so much I want to talk about... but is now a good time?)
Each artist has their own unique techniques and subjects. Not to mention a preferred medium. Just what does ~artist~ prefer?
S-Somehow, I've had people mistake me for a girl before. I don't know how, but I was really embarrassed to explain that I wasn't.
S-Somehow, I've had people mistake me for a girl before. I don't know how. Is it my hair?
Um... Do you need any help, ~ditzy~? I-I'm used to helping Raphael study, so I'm happy to help with your cards. Oh--- I-I'm sorry, I must sound so rude!
Ah--- ~Serious~, you really are competitive... Leonie is a bit similar, I suppose. Even when we spar, she really hits hard!
Huh? B-But, I couldn't even see my cards! I thought we paused?
I couldn't see my cards! Couldn't this be counted as cheating?
This would count as cheating, right?

"Twink", "bimbim", "himbo"?
J-Just what are you calling me, Zoe? Should I be flattered...?
Um, Miss Fluttershy... I hope it isn't weird, but, I do have something to ask you, actually.
Ah, M-Miss Fluttershy, you truly are so kind... Thank you for checking in with me earlier. I, um, appreciate that a lot.
To remove my vest, I have to... pull it over my head. Uh, P-Petra, I'm sorry to ask you... But would you hold my glasses for me?
A-Are you sure? Well, I can't afford to risk it... If you don't mind, I'd appreciate that very much.
I may not look it, but I'm plenty strong. I exercise every day, you know.
Yes, bikinis are for the women. I suppose swim trunks can be for anyone, though.
Bikinis are for women, I guess? Well, I technically could have worn one..,
Ah, it is a Halloween costume, actually... I didn't realize everyone would go as scary things, so I just swapped outfits with my friend.
Well, it's supposed to be. I just swapped clothes with my friend. I hadn't realized everyone would dress up as scary things.
I "should draw her giving birth"? W-What about my hair says I'd ever draw something like that!?
I certainly prefer to paint landscapes. Be it nature or the interior of the Monastery, environments hold a beauty people overlook.
Is it truly that shocking? I've seen men shorter than me, you know. B-Besides, you're a rather tall woman, Miss Jura.
I assure you I am not "delicate". I can handle any bandit thrown my way, you know.
Whatever type of "encounters" you're describing here will not be experienced with me, I can promise you.
What's with this talk of me being feminine? Should I try and be more manly? I didn't give it much thought before...
Oh, I was thinking the same thing! Well--- You're much better dressed than me... but still!
Ah--- I was thinking the same thing! Well--- You're obviously much prettier than I am, but still.
A clone of myself? Oh, I'm not sure what I'd do in that situation! What would you do, Miss Sucrose?
Oh my, counterparts? Um, Fodlan is vast, but I hail from the Leicester Alliance. Oh, it's hard to summarize... The Monastery is run by the church, though! It teaches students magic and knighthood.
(It feels like Miss Sucrose keeps looking at me... Have I done something wrong?)
O-Oh! I've actually begun to make my own paints! It saves so much gold, and it's a nice excuse to go foraging and enjoy nature.
Eek! T-Thank you...? (She must think I'm an easy target!)
W-Well, not really. I mean, I wear glasses, and I'm really not that smart. Just the other day I tripped and broke a stack of dishes.
I simply love to paint. Though, I'm much better at landscapes than portraits, so it might be boring if you join me... Oh! I know! We could study together! I do love a good book.
What exactly are you trying to imply? I paint landscapes. I'm not sure what types of artists you've talked with, but...
I paint landscapes. I'm unsure what ideas you have about artists, but it's certainly not correct.
Are you making fun of me...? Y-Yes, I'm a bit sensitive, but...
Ah, yes! I love to paint, I do so whenever I have free time! H-How could you tell...?
Art is vital in my life. I'll always prefer to do landscapes, especially of nature. Painting newly bloomed flowers will always raise my spirits.
Ah, really? Raphael loves nothing more than eating and exercising... Is Gregor the same way?
You're still thinking about the two of them? Anatoly, I've told you, I really think Raphael is stronger...
W-Well look who's talking, Anatoly! You're shorter than me, and you're 25.
Ah... Well, I do tend to forget some meals...
My glasses are dumb? W-What would you prefer? If I walk around blindly, I'd really look like an idiot, you know. Just what kind of criticism are you giving?
Thank you, Leonie. I promise it'll be just this once...
It's a lot less scary when someone is being so kind to me.
Komi-san, your kind words mean a lot to me. Thank you very much.
A courtier? You flatter me! I don't think I can dream of ever being close to someone of such high status.
It's Ignatz, Saki! Are you doing that on purpose because I'm so "nerdy"?
It's Ignatz, Saki! Saying "no offense" before something so mean doesn't make it any less hurtful!
Nude models aren't the only type of model!
Are artists known for seeing lots of naked people? Because I certainly don't...
Is it that easy to tell I'm not fit for fighting? Well, truth be told, I only joined by my father's command.
Goodness, is height that important to some people? I wish I was taller, but I was just made this way.
I never considered height to be very telling of personality, everyone is different.
A-Are you really sure? It'd be an honor to have you as a patron. But... my art is more of a hobby, I guess.
"Iggy?" Well, I've never really had a nickname like that before.
Painting is the only form of art I have any real talent in. I do love all types of art, though!
Music, hm? My, I can only imagine the wonderful holy songs you must sing.
Oh, t-thank you for your kindness, Nami. I'm just not very used to getting this much attention, that's all.

condition.saying: Hey, hey. You're not pathetic, I promise.

case.state: I'm so sorry, Arash. Sometimes I just get in my head and... Ugh, there's no use rambling about it.
Actually, I learned how from a book! It's actually rather--- Oh, you weren't genuinely asking, were you?
Am I doomed to be forever picked on? I know I'm nothing special, but...
Let's just change the subject. You can pick on me, but make it about something else.
The reason I'm not "thrilled" is because of people like you, Polly! Keep your eyes to yourself!
I can assure you that I'm sad enough as is.
It's as if you know exactly what to say to hurt my feelings, Polly.
Let's hope I don't fall over. Knowing someone is watching is making me kind of jittery!
Anyone who is kind enough to truly accept me and be patient throughout my shortcomings would be... Oh, it's not like it would ever happen.
O-Oh! Thank you, Polly! Those words actually... mean a lot to me.

I want to get better at talking to people and building connections. P-Plus, I thought this could maybe be relaxing...
{small}But if you want me to leave, that's okay!{!reset}
Paint something... freaky? N-No, I have no intentions of doing that!
Um, the answer is no. {small}Who would I even do that with...?{!reset}
No... W-Why do you ask? Is this for some type of weird prank idea?
You're right about the "up-and-close" thing. I suppose my specialty is a bow and arrow. Um--- b-but Leonie and Claude are better than I could ever dream of.
A medic? I don't think I've ever considered that before. I suppose I'm best with a bow and arrow. Even if my classmates are far better than me.

O-Oh, really? I don't know if I'd say I'm dependable... but I'm flattered!
(His best buddy? I'm not blushing, am I...?)
I only can afford this one pair Hilda! Besides, I'm blind without them!
I'm just so scared of them breaking... I can't see at all without them, you know.
W-Well, being so small can really be helpful. I'm quick on my feet, and sneaking around is easy! {small}I'll just take it as a compliment.{!reset}
Ah, yes! Certain pieces of art go for over one hundred thousand gold! O-Or at least, that's what Victor Trading Company merchants have told me. Do you have an interest in art?
Oh but... I-It's a bit hard to relax when people are staring at me! I'm sorry... I know they're just shoes... It's just, um...

Ah, you mean me...? {small}Well I guess I do look a bit geeky...{!reset} But, um, y-yes. The Monastery serves many types of food. I don't really indulge in sweets that often, though. I'd rather just have some tea.
I don't just use a bow, miss. I've been working hard to be proficient with a sword as well, mainly for that exact situation. Even then, a good archer should use less arrows than you need.
Huh? An art store? I do need more sketching paper... But I make all my paints by hand. I-I don't want to inconvenience you for something so small!
Rainbow Valley? A colorful valley, painted by the light of rainbows... Wow! Just the thought gives me shivers! Tell me, how can I get there, Miss Rosa?
A-Are you making fun of me? You have to be... {small}You're mature, beautiful, well known...{!reset} I-I know I'm shrimpy, but I'm certainly grown-up.
Leonie, please look away!
I'm afraid I lack the guts you have, Leonie, so maybe you should look away.
Can I not have one minute to relax!?
Ah, really? So soon?
It's obvious you just want me to strip for you!
T-Three rounds? Oh, what am I doing wrong?
Ah, w-what kind of setup is this? I'm not that bad, am I?
There's no way!
This has to be a setup! You just wanted me naked, didn't you!?
Why are you targeting me, ~player~!?
Did the summer heat get to my head?
Maybe the heat has gotten to my head...
The first loss? Well, I won't whine over it.
Ah, it's hard to focus when ~wealthy~ is here with me... ~wealthy.ifMale(H-He|S-She)~ must be some type of noble, right?
Well, that will teach me to be confident in a simple pair.
I guess my confidence wasn't for a good reason. A simple pair isn't a certified win, after all.
I need to play more carefully. Seeing a pair doesn't secure a win.
Really!? I lost?
But... Isn't two pairs rare? H-How did I lose?
You all are so much better than me, I was so confident in that hand!
A bad start leads to a bad game...
I don't feel very good about this game.
I just need to stay optimistic.
I don't like the look ~slutty~ is giving me.
I'm not interested, ~slutty~! P-Perversion must be stopped!
I'm nothing like ~exhibitionist~, so give me a second to steady my breathing.
I-It's fine... It's not weird, especially in comparison to ~exhibitionist~'s enthusiasm, right?
~Kind~, thank you so much for being so patient with me. I-I really appreciate it.
Maybe it's not so scary after all. At least, not when ~kind~ is here.
Taking these off in front of ~agg~? B-But, ~agg.ifMale(he's|she's)~ going to laugh at me!
With ~agg~ watching me? I-- You're going to laugh!
What, ~player~? Do you just want ~agg~ to continue to be mean to me?
Well, ~kind~ has been so supportive... I owe ~kind.ifMale(him|her)~ this, at least.
~Kind~ has been so nice to me this whole game. I owe it to ~kind.ifMale(him|her)~ to follow through.
B-But, you all are women! You don't want to see this, right?
You want me to undress? B-But... a girl has never seen me like this before!
I'm nothing special, no woman here wants to see this, right?
No, there's no way any woman would have interest in someone like me...
Are you sure you want me to take these off...?
The expectant gaze of women... I'm terrified!
Deep breaths... deep breaths, Ignatz!
I suppose this isn't too different from changing in a locker room.
The men at my school have to share a restroom, so this isn't too different.
I had run into my classmate in a towel once. It was embarrassing, but at least we were both men.
O-Oh! Well, that's alright.
Well you win some you lose some!
It's not a big deal, no worries...
I definitely didn't expect that to happen!
Oh? Well, rules are rules!
That's fine.
Getting a little too close for comfort here...
I'm very grateful to be in the lead at the very least.
(It'll all be fine. I don't need to make a big deal out of it.)
I suppose it's only fair...
I can't tell if losing more clothes will make me more comfortable around half naked people, or less comfortable...
S-So much attention makes me nervous... At least I'm not messing up too bad.
I won't lose after this!
This shouldn't be too bad.
It's important I move out of my comfort zone every so often.
I guess so!
It isn't a huge deal, I suppose.
It's only fair...
Would it make everyone feel a little less awkward?
Well, I can't win them all!
Still in first, deep breaths!
I suppose it c-could be worse...?
Just give me a moment to gather my courage.
I can do it! Just think positively! I'm winning, aren't I?
Ah, it's okay, it's only my shoes.
It's too early to be confident in winning.
I hope the floor isn't too cold, these socks are rather thin.
Being in the middle is oddly painful...
I'm okay!
I can still win this!
I won't lose another match after this...!
Should have seen that coming...
Well, I did my best. Isn't that what matters most?
It seems my best wasn't enough...
Uuu.... I suppose...
I'm sorry, please give me a second to collect myself.
Well, I suppose rules are rules... Deep breaths!
Can I at least take these off behind a tree?
Did I forget a rule or something?
And I thought I wasn't an idiot...
My best just isn't enough...
If I must.
It's still the beginning, I can flip this around!
I won't let this upset me!
I'll still win this!
Stay determined.
I-It's a bit nerve wracking, losing like this...
What am I doing wrong?
Is this some elaborate prank?
Last place... and such little clothing left...
Can I still win this?
My, am I really still in last?
The first to take these off...?
I guess this will improve my bravery...
I really messed this game up.
G-Goodness, my heart is about to leap out of my chest!
There's no use in me whining over it, so I'll continue.
Oh, it doesn't matter... It's not like I can see everyone's disgusted reactions.
At least I got my glasses back, and it only cost me t-two losses.
Oh, two rounds wasted looking for my glasses! I'll have to do better to make up for that.
I'm so sorry that I wasted those last rounds. They weren't too boring for you, right?
Well, actually... I came here to get better at talking to others. Will you be honest with me when I ask... Have I been annoying? I feel I've been rambling on and on.
Would you, um, like to be friends? I-I can make us some tea and we can watch the birds... Only i-if you want, though! {small}I'm sorry, I don't mean to be so forward!{!reset}
Later on I can tie both of our cravats. If you want, I mean...
Thank you for holding onto them! The prescription is quite strong, I don't know what I'd do if I ever lost them!
Do you think so? I was worried it looked silly, but I've grown to rather like it.
The scenery of your hometown? I'd be happy to paint it! But... Are you sure you won't be bored? Sitting there in silence while I paint... I can't imagine it'd be much fun.
Oh! I suppose we do both have our garters...
I'd already look rather silly in an outfit like yours, with or without help holding anything up. Not that you don't like n-nice in it!
M-My family? My parents run a merchant business that my brother will be taking over... It's nothing special, we're just commoners, after all.
H-Huh? I'm sorry, what did you say Miss Sucrose? You w-were muttering at the end...
S-So you aren't going to make fun of me...? I'm so used to women jeering at me over my height... T-Thank you, Meia. I appreciate your kind words.
You weren't making fun of me...? Oh, I'm so used to women making fun of my height... Thank you for your kind words, Meia. I, um, appreciate them a lot.
P-Pretty? Surely you're kidding. You're pretty, miss, not me. I-I'm short and thin, who would want that in a man?
Um, y-you're scaring me a bit. You just... know things about me? I know it's harmless, but...

The language of flowers... I'd love to hear about such a thing! Is it the arrangements themselves, or the symbolism behind flowers that carry importance in Liyue society? Would you like... t-to teach me?
Hm...? You're certain of that... But really, I think you don't realize what Raphael looks like.
M-Must I remind you we attend a military academy? Raphael is the strongest guy I've ever known. He can pick me up with one hand!
Urgh... The only way Gregor would win is if Raphael let him! H-He's such a sweet guy, maybe he'll pity your friend?
I just get so distracted. I only have so much time to paint, I don't want to interrupt the process with a meal...
I attend a special type of school. Technically, it's a military academy. We're, um, training to be knights.
Oh, I hope I'm not overstepping but... I do love designing things, so if you want any help for clothing I'd be happy to supply.
"The opposite of holy"? Oh my... I'll pray for you.
"Attractive"? Was this some weird flirting tactic?
No, you can't just do that! It's not like anybody would even want to see something like that!
Well, um... {small}I l-like to... draw...{!reset}
Yes, that's very true. It's... It's nice to be dependable. But it's just so stressful. So much can go wrong, I don't want to hold anyone back.
I'm made fun of enough by my one classmate, so I'd appreciate you stopping.
T-Thank you, Lux...
My one friend calls me "Ig" sometimes. It makes me happier than it probably should.

I won't trouble you with my issues, but I was enrolled mainly to make connections for my family. My brother is taking the merchant business, so I'm nothing more than an {small}a-afterthought...{!reset}
Y-Yes, I'm quite alright, Fluttershy... I'm just not very used to so much attention. I'm sorry for worrying you.

At home, there's so many men better than me. It just makes sense for them to be more, um, sought after?
{small}Do you really think I'm cute?{!reset}

Many men at home are just... better than me, I suppose. Nobody would want to be with a commoner, especially not when they're like me.
{small}D-Do you really think I'm cute?{!reset}
People don't think green is a pretty color? Oh...
Do you really think so? Thank you, Fluttershy! I think your hair is beautiful as well!
Y-Yes, I suppose you're correct about that, Takatoshi...
I just h-hope nobody will be disappointed... I'll take your word, though.
Ah--- You can look, Miss Sucrose... B-But please don't judge me too harshly!

condition.saying: Do not worry, Ignatz. My lips will be closed about this.

Please, ~3houses~, don't tell anyone about this!

These shoes belong to the Monastery, so I'll be sure I don't lose them. There's no way I could pay for a replacement, anyways.
I mainly paint in secret, which means a lot of walking. I'm lucky that these shoes are rather comfortable.

Maybe I'll feel better without my shorts?

Oh thank the Goddess... I kept my pants on the whole match!
Is everyone okay?
You aren't trying to fool me right?
I've never talked this much. Maybe this game does help with shyness!
Too close for comfort...
That was a close one...
I'm so happy! Thank you all for spending this time with me!
I-I won, but after watching everyone else enjoy themselves like that...
I made it through!
I know I've won, but everyone saw me naked... This is still really humiliating.
I won? R-Really?
Thank you all for being patient with me, this was fun!
I can't believe I've gotten over my shyness like this! Thank you for befriending me...
Oh, I just got lucky...
Game is over.
Unlocks the brush collectible.
Kazuma's luck really is scary!
The world truly is hers.
I can't show my face around the Monastery anymore--- I'm so sorry Leonie!
Hard work and determination really does best all. Congratulations Leonie!
I'm not surprised. See how well you do when you put effort into things?
This went about as well as our training matches.
All because I lost one round?
That one round decided everything! Well, congrats, ~name~!
I'm begging you Leonie... please don't tell Raphael anything...
Well, I'll see you at the Monastery, Bernadetta.
Going from speaking behind a door to playing a game like this, you did great!
Ah, I really came in second place? Oh, I did much better than I expected! Erm, congrats, ~name~!
Congratulations ~name~, you bested me!
I'm okay with getting second. That was surprisingly fun.
I'm exhausted after that game! Maybe I should just relax on the sand...
Congratulations, ~name~! You completely burned me!
Summer is made for relaxing, is it not? Let's play again sometime!
Ah, I'm so tired... Maybe a piece of candy would help me stay awake, if just for a bit longer...
Goodness, you're so good it's scary, ~name~!
C-Congratulations, ~name~! Um... good job?
So was this some type of blackmail? You're going to tease me, aren't you?
I know you're going to hold this over my head and make fun of me, but congrats on winning.
This wasn't fair! Did nobody notice ~name~ was cheating?
Using underhanded tactics to win in a game like this... You disappoint me, ~name~.
I'm a terrible friend... I can't believe I said his name...
With stakes so high, that game was really exciting! Let's... play again sometime?
Congratulations on winning, ~name~!
T-Thank you so much for having me! I'd gladly play again with you, just give me a bit to calm my heartbeat...
Maybe that was a little fun. Heheh, it's certainly more interesting than chess!
Collectible obtained.
Unlocks collectable.
Unlocks collectable.
Unlocks the brush collectible.
Game is over.

{takatoshi}Jeez, Ignatz... You ever do this by yourself? You're pretty pent-up...{!reset}
{ignatz}I... Ah... I-It's been a bit...{!reset}
{takatoshi}Huh... Yours is a little softer than mine... Smaller, too...{!reset} <hr> {ignatz}We're built so differently... I can't help but notice such a thing.{!reset}
{takatoshi}Heh... You're making some pretty cute noises. N-Not that I was paying attention to that...{!reset} <hr> {ignatz}I-I can't help it... Ah, it's... Oh my, I can barely speak...!{!reset}
{takatoshi}You don't gotta hold it in, Ignatz. Keep everything pent up like that and you're gonna explode...{!reset} <hr> {ignatz}Ah... I-I'm sorry, I tend to forget how good it feels...{!reset}
{takatoshi}This, uh... This feel good for you?{!reset} <hr> {ignatz}Mm... Yes, p-please continue...!{!reset}
{takatoshi}Man, Okino's never gonna let me hear the end of this...{!reset} <hr> {ignatz}Y-You're going to tell him about this...?{!reset}
{takatoshi}It's a little hard to get a good grip... Guess my hand's a little too big.{!reset} <hr> {ignatz}It feels so different from my own...{!reset}
{takatoshi}E-Ever done something like this at that Academy of yours?{!reset} <hr> {ignatz}No, I-I haven't. This type of intimacy is so new to me...{!reset}
{takatoshi}I've never had anybody do something like this to me... H-How's it feel?{!reset} <hr> {ignatz}Ah... I-It feels good, don't worry. Takatoshi...{!reset}
{takatoshi}J-Just let me know if you want me to stop...{!reset} <hr> {ignatz}Ah... N-No, please don't stop...!{!reset}
{ignatz}I can feel your heartbeat... Takatoshi, a-are you nervous?{!reset} <hr> {takatoshi}D-Don't worry about me, alright? Just focus on what you're feeling...
{ignatz}Y-You don't have to be so careful. I can handle it, I promise...{!reset} <hr> {takatoshi}You sure? I mean, you're so small... Can't help but think you're delicate...
{ignatz}Thank you... T-This is... This is all so new for me.{!reset} <hr> {takatoshi}Trust me, it's new for me too...
{ignatz}H-Have you ever, um... Have you done this before...?{!reset} <hr> {takatoshi}O-Of course not! You're just... a special exception, that's all...
{ignatz}I'm so sorry. I-I don't want to embarrass myself, but...{!reset} <hr> {takatoshi}I think we're a little past the point of worrying about embarrassing ourselves...
{ignatz}You're much bigger than me... I-I'm sorry, I keep thinking about that...{!reset} <hr> {takatoshi}That's funny... I was just thinking about how small you are...
{ignatz}Ah... Your hands are a bit rougher, b-but it feels... so good...{!reset} <hr> {takatoshi}You think...? Me, I prefer a bit of a softer touch...

{ignatz}Takatoshi... Is there a-anything I could do for you...?{!reset}
{takatoshi}Just try to squirm a little less... Feels like you're gonna slip out at any second...
{ignatz}Y-You're so handsome... It fills me with such inspiration...{!reset} <hr> {takatoshi}R-Really? Uh... thanks...

{ignatz}You have such a wonderful body, I-I have to capture it on canvas... Would you let me?{!reset} <hr> {takatoshi}Sure, if that's what you want... Here I was thinking I looked like any other punk from the 80s.

{ignatz}Ah... W-Would you ever let me touch you like this...?{!reset}
{takatoshi}Uh... W-Well, I mean, I wouldn't say no...
Everyone please watch your step, my glasses are somewhere on the floor!
I'm sorry everyone b-but it seems my glasses fell off. Please watch your step!
They're alright! I'm good to continue now!
Oh thank the Goddess, I found them! I'll join again!
I found them, they're okay! I'll start playing again now!
"Iggy"? Does this make us friends?
I'm... ashamed to admit that Hilda's words are having an effect on me as well...
A haircut? Is there something wrong with your hair? Well, if you'd like me to wait that's alright.
I agree completely! I can only hope I can bring your form the justice it deserves, Lux.
You look nothing short of a war hero, Lux. It would be an honor to paint you.
R-Really? I honestly had expected a no... You're so beautiful Fina, it would be an honor.
It doesn't have to be nude! I'm sorry, did I make it sound like it had to be?
Oh goodness, like that? M-Maybe I could, um, if you want...
Oh my... N-No, I intended for it to be fully clothed...
A portrait like that... I've never even attempted it! Goodness Fina, I didn't intend for these implications but...
You'd like that, Penny? I'm happy to!
Ah, that's alright, Miku. I apologize if I overstepped.
Ignatz! It's Ignatz, Saki! But um, yes, I'd be happy to paint you and your friends...
Oh my, of course not nude! I didn't sound like that's what I wanted, right?

I mean... I've never even had a girl come into my room before! Well, if I don't count Leonie that time she returned a flower I lost. Or when Marianne needed to talk. But still! What if my room's too gross? I promise you I clean it! It's just that---

I've never even had a woman in my room before! A woman, right? Or should I say lady? Do you prefer girl? Am I being rude right now? I'm so very sorry. My Professor usually says I'm too polite, but maybe I've broken through that and become too rude---
You'd like me to stay? R-Really? If you say so, Penny...
I'm so sorry, Penny! I shouldn't have said that. It was weird, wasn't it?
What do you mean you "can see why"!?
Eighty years!? How old are you exactly?
You're starting to hurt my head here...
A pig? Cats and dogs are all over the Monastery, but I haven't seen a pig in quite a while.
I haven't seen a pig since I was a child! Oh, it brings back so many memories...
"Adorable"? Oh, Penny, you're the adorable one here!
I-I don't mind, not if it's with you, Penny... Hehe, cutie!
Oh my goodness, that joke was terrible! I can't believe I really said that!
That was... awful. I'm so sorry.
That joke did nothing to help me appear less pathetic.
That was awful! I can't believe I really said something that stupid!
I usually keep my distance, so losing my glasses isn't a huge concern. Oh! Once, I did this weird flip to dodge an attack, and my glasses flew right off! {small}It was so embarrassing...{!reset}
S-Should I have kept that part to myself? I promise you, I'm not like... a m-mindless killer or anything!
I can't help but feel silly for thinking that way. I know it's natural, and it's not like I'd ever shame someone else for doing it.
Miss Lucina, your kindness to me is truly touching. Thank you, really.
Please don't concern yourself with looking, Miss Fina. I was the one who lost them, so I'll search.
Um, Colress? What is that thing you're holding?
Thank you very much. I don't know what I'd do if the whole Monastery knew something like this!
Sets Ignatz's AI as throw for when he doesn't have his glasses.
Returns Ignatz's AI to normal after he finds his glasses.
Sets Ignatz to throw when Bernadetta is at a certain stage.
Resets Ignatz's AI after Bernadetta has lost.
Ignatz stops throwing the game for Bernadetta when he reaches stage 4.

scene.name: Intro
scene.directive: After playing at The Inventory with Ignatz, you decided to accept his offer of painting you.
He'd seemed so surprised, as if he expected you to grow angry at him.
The relief on his face had made you smile.
How could you ever say no to him?

scene.name: Outside
scene.directive: Leading to now, standing in front of Ignatz's dorm door.
It wasn't odd for people to walk in and out of the Monastery, they let you in with no complaints, after all.
Yet standing in front of Ignatz's door still feels a bit odd.
Hesitating for a second, you knock.
Knock knock!
Just one second!
You can hear the faint sound of something falling, as well as a sigh of disappointment through the door.
Ignatz's urgent steps eventually end up at the door, turning the knob slowly to peak at who exactly was knocking.
Seeing you, his face lights up.
You really came, ~player~?
Oh, I'm so glad!
Ignatz's eyes sparkle with creativity, urgent to begin.
Oh, I'm so sorry, how rude of me!
Please, come in.
Ignatz steps aside, watching with a pleasant smile as you walk into his room.

scene.name: Interior
scene.directive: As one would expect from someone like him, the room is organized carefully.
Thumbnail sketches hang on a corkboard, a wet watercolor piece lying on his dresser to dry.
Books scatter around near his desk, which is cluttered with a mixture of passion projects and homework.
I'm sorry it's so messy in here, sometimes I get rather lost in my work.
You shake your head to calm his nerves, he must have caught you staring around.
Here, I'll set up my easel.
Stubbornly saying he "can do it himself" once you look over to help him, Ignatz begins to set up a worn easel that sits near his door.
He shuffles past you to grab some paints off his desk.
Excuse me, ~player~...
Watching Ignatz hurriedly buzz around to set up for your portrait is endearing to say the least.
Just need to...
And this...
Hm, should I use this?
With another exhale to calm himself, Ignatz stands behind his easel.
Carefully, he peers at you.

scene.name: PaintingBegin
scene.directive: If you don't mind, can you stand to the right of the bedstand?
I t-think I'm ready to begin painting.
Following his words, you adjust where you stand.
That's perfect!
Now, please strike whatever pose you want, I'm going to set my paints up.
With a worldess nod, you grab at the hem of your shirt and begin to undress.
With Ignatz looking away and preoccupied with his paints, the reaction is lackluster, but you're standing shirtless across from him.
Next comes your pants, undoing the button and unzipping the fly.
Hearing the zipper causes Ignatz to curiously look back up at you.
His eyes go wide when he sees your lack of a shirt.
W-Where did your shirt go!? And your hands--- Why are they on your pants?
Your head tilts in confusion.
Calmly you explain to him that he had wanted a nude portrait.
Nude??
No! I didn't mean--
Oh, now I sound angry at you...
Concerned, you take a step towards Ignatz.
Ah! Have I upset you!?
No, it's just---
Hold on, please g-give me a second...
You take a step backwards, allowing Ignatz to close his eyes and steady his breathing.
He exhales for a long while, afterwards turning to bashfully look at you.
I'm sorry, this is all my fault.
Asking in the middle of a game like that... Of course you'd assume I meant a nude portrait...
I'm so sorry, ~player~.
You must be so disappointed.
Your face falls to a frown, taking another step towards him.
Ignatz looks away from the floor and back to you.

scene.name: BeforeKiss
scene.directive: You don't need to comfort me.
It's not even a big deal.
I'm being dramatic, as I always am.
You don't need to stay, I'm sorry I wasted your time like this.
Again, you take another step towards him and his easel.
"I want to stay."
Ignatz looks up at you curiously.
No, I'm sure you're just... saying that.
Gently, you push the easel to the side, careful to not mess anything resting on it.
One last step forwards, and Ignatz is staring directly into your eyes, close enough to hold.
He's shorter than you, head tilted up ever so slightly.
~Player~...
Slowly, you lean closer to him.
Ignatz follows suit, nervously inching just the tiniest bit closer.
He looks at you again.
Y-You... can kiss me, if you want, I-I mean.
It's hard to deny the amusement that he was able to guess what was on your mind.

scene.name: Kiss
scene.directive: Your hand gently brings his chin the slightest bit up, and slowly you move forwards to kiss him softly.
Mm...
A smile forms against his lips.
Ignatz moves further into your arms, cautiously pressing against you.
After a bit, you pull away with a pleased smile.
I... That was... my first kiss.
~Player~...
Thank you. I...
A smile blossoms on your face.
Your hands find their way to his hair, carding through it soothingly.
He leans into the touch.
You're so kind to me, ~player~.
Why?
You could have anyone you choose, so why are you spending your time here with me?
Without hesitation, you answer.
"Because I want to."
And again, you press your lips to his.
Ignatz's arms wrap around you despite your missing top.
You can't help but return the motion, holding him close to your body.
The heat from his blushing cheeks radiates onto your own face, yet you can't seem to find it anything but adorable.
Ignatz pulls away slowly, reluctantly.
Maybe, just maybe...
I could do a n-nude portrait.
Just for you, ~player~.
I trust you.
Despite how close he is, and how far the easel has been pushed aside you place your hands on your open pants.
Slowly, you begin to take them off.
Standing just in your underwear, Ignatz's eyes flash with ideas again.
"Would you want to do more than just a portrait?"
Ignatz nods.
Quickly, you aid Ignatz in removing his vest, undoing the buttonup in a flash.
Goodness, my vest nearly knocked my
Goodness, my vest nearly knocked my glasses clean off my face!
He sheds the buttonup with a laugh, impressed by your enthusiasm.
~Player~, you can sit on the bed, i-if you want.
If I'm not painting you today, I'd love to show my appreciation for your kindness another way...

scene.name: Missionary
scene.directive: This is, um, okay... right?
I didn't move too fast, r-right?
I'm sorry, I'm a bit nervous.
"You can hold my hand if it helps."
Wait a minute... This isn't portrait painting! This is anal sex!
H-Hold your hand? Are you sure that's okay?
Well, actually... that sounds quite nice.
I think I'm ready now, ~player~.
Goodness, you're big...
Ah... Is that a-all of you?
Y-Yes... Please, you can move now...
Yes... like that...
Ohh...
Ahh!
W-What was that feeling!?
Huff... huff...

scene.name: Ending
scene.directive: Thank you so very much for playing through Ignatz's epilogue!
I hope you enjoyed, I'm sorry if it was a bit wordy.
A female variant will be worked on, but it might take a bit!
Thank you again! -- Cali
